archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Capture Product Capability Shortfalls
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Identify specific or imminent product capacity, product performance and/or product operational support shortfalls

properties.value: The Capture Product Capability Shortfalls processes identify specific or imminent product capacity, product performance and/or product operational support shortfalls. These processes take information available from the Customer Relationship Management processes to establish detailed views of anticipated product capacity and performance shortfalls and support process issues.
